# iosxe_l2_vfi (Data Source)

This data source can read the L2 VFI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_l2_vfi" "example" {
  name = "TENANT-A"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `mode` (String)
- `neighbors` (Attributes List) VFI neighbor configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors))
- `vpn_id` (Number) VPN id

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors`

Read-Only:

- `encapsulation` (String) Connection encapsulation type
- `ip_address` (String)
